summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York requesting a copy of the search warrant affidavit and order for Jeffrey Epstein's residence, which was executed by local authorities before the FBI became involved in the case.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney Southern District of New York
persons.context: Author of the email requesting the search warrant documents related to the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Search of Epstein Residence
events.description: Local authorities executed a search warrant at Jeffrey Epstein's residence before the case was brought to the FBI.

keyFacts: The email is dated March 20, 2019, during the ongoing Epstein investigation.
The Assistant U.S. Attorney is seeking the search warrant affidavit and order for Epstein's residence.
The search was executed by local authorities before the FBI took over the case.
The documents were not found in the materials reviewed by the prosecutor's office.
This indicates coordination issues or document transfer problems between local and federal authorities.
